examples:
Refund request reason: I only tried using the trial Canva Pro before last Christmas and thereafter I did not use it and I have cancelled it a week before the trail period is up. Why am I being charged? Please refund the subscription as I don't need the plan. 

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: When I use your trail you  promised me that you will charge further only after sending renewal alert. But you didn' send  alert  when the trail  end. Rather you unilateral charged the amount without my consent. you cheated me. So i need the money back. you Can see that I never used this account after the trail expired. Actually I forgot the user name and password as I use multyple email accounts. Only today i got the user name. hence I logged in and cancelled the subscription. So please refund the amount

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I was charged and nees to be refunded
 I have lost my job and cannot afford this subscription i thought i had cancelled before my trail was over

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Good day,
I was on trail with Canva and I forgot to cancel my subscription
I would like to know can I refund my money back

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I didnt use canva much during the trail as i found it was a different tool to my needs. Unfortunately i didnt remember to cancel the trail and so i was charged a day ago. Can you please cancel the subscription and revert me back the money i paid towards it. Thanks for understanding.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I tried a trail of canva pro and haven't used it since I paid for it and just cancel. Can you refund me please?

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi there, I would like to receive a refund for the unauthorized charge. I did sign up for the free trail but was not notified of this charge taking place with out further authorization or a reminder and cannot afford it as I am a single mother of 3 babies. I have fully canceled my subscription and have not used this app since the day I originally used the trial.. can you please please give me this refund.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I tried canceling the subscription was was not successful the first time I had so much going on here I did not want for it to go past the trail. Please assist me with processing my refund for 12.95

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I opened this account for my 7 year old son who used it only a few times. We must have clicked on the free pro trail option and I meant to cancel it before the trail was up but I totally forgot. I'm really hoping you can cancel the subscription as of today And refund me in full. Your help would be really appreciated.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: It didn't get notified of my free trail ending prior to week or atleast 3-4 days prioer to billing date. Money is taken out of my account yesterday without any notice. I need refund.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I signed up for the free trail and never took it further.  I never confirmed my account so not sure why you have now charged me.  Can you please refund my payment ASAP.
Cheers
Michele

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: though I have cancelled trail pack still charged money for that. I am not interested in this. Not satisfied.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I did not sign up for this subscription! I was on a free trail and was not aware that my card would be used for this! I thought my card would be taken off after the trail was over. I have bills to pay I cannot afford this subscription right now please refund me!

Invoice number: <NUMBER>Refund request reason: My son accessed the free trail and I did not know how to get him out. Tried to cancel multiple times but to no avail. The truth is that I did not want to continue with the subscription because I do not have the funds to pay it. I apologize a thousand times and I hope you can refund the money, since in my country it is a lot of money.

מס' <NAME>: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello,
yesterday was my final day for the canva pro free trail, and i forgot to cancel it. I can't afford this kind of payment and would like to recieve a refund please.
thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I only signed up for the trail. I understand it renews but I was not ready to pay it. Please could I get a refund

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, I wanted to start a free trail but I haven't notice that I already used it and I purchased yearly subscription by mistake. Could you please cancel this and refund my money?

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I have decided not to continue the subscription becuause I do not use most of the premium features in Canva. And I have cancelled the subscription on the last day of trail which is on 17 January, however, I was being charged. Hope you can help me refund. Thank you.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi
I didnt realise the free triel would charge me at the end of it- i though it would automatically cancel the free trail- please can you refund the charge- as i dont want to pay for it? I havent used it really in the free trial either
best wishes

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I had cancelled the free trail online. But, still I had been charged today. I would request a refund. Hope you would help me out. Thanks!!!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I only wanted the trail. I did not want the subscription to renew.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: i had cancelled the trail period before the end date and I still got charged. Can you tell me why? please

發票號碼: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hi, I forgot to cancel my subscription after free trail. Is it possible to cancel it and refund the money please?

Thank you so much

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I signed up for a trail with Canva and they said they would notify me when my trail was ending but I never received a notification. Thank you!

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello my Shannice, 
I would like a refund on the subscription that I’m charged for. 
I didn’t actually sign up for this I wanted a trail as it was my kids that have subscribed to this and  I’ve been charged 2 times 
As I’m furlough I don’t have to be taken without me knowing as it is tight right now. 

Thank you 
Shannice

Invoice no.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello my Shannice, 
I would like a refund on the subscription that I’m charged for. 
I didn’t actually sign up for this I wanted a trail as it was my kids that have subscribed to this and  I’ve been charged 2 times 
As I’m furlough I don’t have to be taken without me knowing as it is tight right now. 

Thank you 
Shannice

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Good morning Canva, I truly enjoyed the trail of canva pro, but, unfortunately can not afford the price for now. I need the money for other expenses. Thank you

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Request to cancel the pro subscription was processed prior to the end of the trail period, however my card was still charged.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I wasn't made aware that the money would be billed off my account without my consent. I thought I subscribed to a free trail. I dont like the software and therefore dont want to purchase further and would like my money back please:)

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I'm not using it and tried to cancel the trail but kept getting an error message. please refund me and cancel my subscription. thank you!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: i emailed a request to have this cancelled after the free trail

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Hello, 
I wanted to try Canva and I set a reminder on my phone so I could cancel it yesterday when the trail expired but I had already been charged for 116 dollars. I  would like to request a refund. I simply cannot afford this right now. I would really appreciate a refund!

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: Im sorry i have been sick and forgot to cancel my membership during my free trail
thanks
<NAME>

Describe your issue: The app charged me on trail period. I just used the app once and I thought it’s only trail, I was surprised when they charged me. 
I would like to request a refund.

What kind of problem?: Other

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: i forgot to cancel my free trail before the subscription came into effect.

Invoice No.: <NUMBER>

Refund request reason: I couldn't regcognize the end date of free trail.
(wanna use only trail)
